name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SG's Better PvP Pardus Extension, TE

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keyboard actions for PvP in the online game Pardus. Trader Edition

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scorpion Guard's Better PVP Keyboard Actions Extension...

Now with Waypoint functionality!

New Default keys:
W : Travel to next waypoint
Y : Add new waypoint
U : Clear waypoints


Source at: https://github.com/Tsunder/SGPvP
